messages.body:
FROM THE DESK OF:
 MR.WANG QIN
 HANG SENG BANK LTD.
 DES VOEUX RD.BRANCH
 CENTRAL HONG KONG
 HONG KONG.
 FAX.852-301-43948

 I am Mr.Wang Qin, credit officer of Hang Seng Bank Ltd. I have an
urgent and very confidential business proposition for you. On June 6,
2001, a Iraq Oil consultant/contractor with the Chinese Solid Minerals
Corporation,  Before the U.S and Iraqi war our client General. Ibrahim
Moussa who was with the Iraqi forces and also business man made a
numbered fixed deposit for 18 calendar months. Upon maturity,I sent a
routine notification to his forwarding address but got no reply. After a
month, we sent a reminder and finally we discovered from his contract
employers, the Hong Kong Solid Minerals Corporation that Gen. Ibrahim
Moussa died from bomb blast with family during the last war in iraq. On
further investigation, I found out that he died without making a WILL,
and all attempts to trace his next of kin was fruitless.

 I therefore made further investigation and discovered that Gen.
Ibrahim Moussa did not declare any kin or relations in all his official
documents, including his Bank Deposit paperwork in my Bank. This sum of
US$20,500,000.00 is still sitting in my Bank and the interest is being
 rolled over with the principal sum at the end of each year. No one
will ever come forward to claim it. According to Laws of Hong Kong, at
the expiration of 5(five) years, the money will revert to the ownership
of the Hong Kong Government if nobody applies to claim the fund.

 Consequently, my proposal is that I will like you as a foreigner to
stand in as the next of kin to Gen. Ibrahim Moussa, so that the fruits
of this old man's labor will not get into the hands of some corrupt
government officials.This is simple, I will like you to provide
immediately your full names and address so that the attorney will
prepare the necessary documents and affidavits that will put you in
place as the next of kin. We shall employ the services of an attorney
for drafting and notarization  of the WILL and to obtain the necessary
documents and letter of probate/administration in your favor for the
transfer. A bank account in any part of the world that you will provide
will then facilitate the  transfer of this money to you as the
beneficiary/next of kin. The money will be paid into your account for us
to share in the ratio of 70% for me and 25% for you and 5% for Expenses
Incurred in the course of the transaction .

 There is no risk at all as all the paperwork for this transaction will
be done by the attorney and with my position as the credit officer
guarantees the successful execution of this transaction. If you are
interested, please reply immediately,by sending me a fax on the number
 above, or to my email: wangqinhk1@netscape.net, Upon your response,I
shall then provide you with more details and relevant documents that
will help you understand the transaction. Please send me your
confidential telephone and fax numbers for easy  communication. You
should observe
 utmost confidentiality, and rest assured that this transaction would
be most profitable for both of us because I shall  require your
assistance to invest my share in your country.

 Awaiting your urgent reply.
 Thanks and regards.
 Mr.Wang Qin.
I reply:
messages.raw:
WANG QIN

FROM THE DESK OF: MR.WANG QIN HANG SENG BANK LTD. DES VOEUX RD.BRANCH CENTRAL HONG KONG HONG KONG. FAX.852-301-43948

I am Mr.Wang Qin, credit officer of Hang Seng Bank Ltd. I have an urgent and very confidential business proposition for you. On June 6, 2001, a Iraq Oil consultant/contractor with the Chinese Solid Minerals Corporation, Before the U.S and Iraqi war our client General. Ibrahim Moussa who was with the Iraqi forces and also business man made a numbered fixed deposit for 18 calendar months. Upon maturity,I sent a routine notification to his forwarding address but got no reply. After a month, we sent a reminder and finally we discovered from his contract employers, the Hong Kong Solid Minerals Corporation that Gen. Ibrahim Moussa died from bomb blast with family during the last war in iraq. On further investigation, I found out that he died without making a WILL, and all attempts to trace his next of kin was fruitless.

I therefore made further investigation and discovered that Gen. Ibrahim Moussa did not declare any kin or relations in all his official documents, including his Bank Deposit paperwork in my Bank. This sum of US$20,500,000.00 is still sitting in my Bank and the interest is being rolled over with the principal sum at the end of each year. No one will ever come forward to claim it. According to Laws of Hong Kong, at the expiration of 5(five) years, the money will revert to the ownership of the Hong Kong Government if nobody applies to claim the fund.

Consequently, my proposal is that I will like you as a foreigner to stand in as the next of kin to Gen. Ibrahim Moussa, so that the fruits of this old man's labor will not get into the hands of some corrupt government officials.This is simple, I will like you to provide immediately your full names and address so that the attorney will prepare the necessary documents and affidavits that will put you in place as the next of kin. We shall employ the services of an attorney for drafting and notarization of the WILL and to obtain the necessary documents and letter of probate/administration in your favor for the transfer. A bank account in any part of the world that you will provide will then facilitate the transfer of this money to you as the beneficiary/next of kin. The money will be paid into your account for us to share in the ratio of 70% for me and 25% for you and 5% for Expenses Incurred in the course of the transaction .

There is no risk at all as all the paperwork for this transaction will be done by the attorney and with my position as the credit officer guarantees the successful execution of this transaction. If you are interested, please reply immediately,by sending me a fax on the number above, or to my email: wangqinhk1@netscape.net, Upon your response,I shall then provide you with more details and relevant documents that will help you understand the transaction. Please send me your confidential telephone and fax numbers for easy communication. You should observe utmost confidentiality, and rest assured that this transaction would be most profitable for both of us because I shall require your assistance to invest my share in your country.

Awaiting your urgent reply. Thanks and regards. Mr.Wang Qin.

I reply:

messages.body:
Dear Mr. Qin,

 

I am very excited about your proposal.  Please send me more information.  I
could use some extra cash as my boat the "Minnow" is in need of some major
repairs.  I am about to go out on a tour when I received your letter.  I am in
Hawaii and we are leaving with 5 passengers for a three hour cruise.  The
weather is starting to look stormy some I have to go.  My first mate Gilligan
is waving me to the boat, so send me more information and I will get back to
you soon.

 

Skipper
messages.raw:
SKIPPER

Dear Mr. Qin,

I am very excited about your proposal. Please send me more information. I could use some extra cash as my boat the "Minnow" is in need of some major repairs. I am about to go out on a tour when I received your letter. I am in Hawaii and we are leaving with 5 passengers for a three hour cruise. The weather is starting to look stormy some I have to go. My first mate Gilligan is waving me to the boat, so send me more information and I will get back to you soon.

Skipper

messages.body:
HANG SENG BANK LTD 
DES VOEUX RD.BRANCH
CENTRAL HONG KONG                                                

FAX:   852-301-43948
 
RE: OUR CONFIDENTIAL BUSINESS MATTER
 
Dear Skipper,

First and foremost I wish to thank you very much for your quick response to my
proposal and your willingness to assist us in this our beneficial transaction.
However let me explain to you what this transaction is all about and also to
let you know your part in making this transaction a successful one. Just as the
proposal briefly explained, the funds we want to transfer into your provided
account is a credit balance of one of our numerous customers who died some year
ago. 

This is the basis on which we started soliciting assistance from you to help us
by providing your required Banking co-ordinates into which the funds will be
transferred as the next-of-kin to Gen. Ibrahim Moussa. Since all is now ready
for this transfer with your declared assistance, we want you to understand that
the level of confidentiality required in this deal should not be neglected. As
such, we implore you to maintain absolute secrecy throughout the consummation
of this transaction since we cannot afford a mistake. We have perfected
modalities through which approvals will be secured in a matter of days with
your maximum co-operation and also following all the required instructions that
may be given to you during the course of this transaction. On the other hand,
we will not be having any problems since we are same people that are going to
handle everything pertaining to approvals in the Bank here.

The most important thing to note at this juncture is the importance of daily
communication with me via fax/e-mail communication. This will help us bridge
any gap and be fully acquainted with the day-to-day development in this
transaction. I may not be able to call you always since all outgoing
international calls from the bank are made through the secretary/operator, as
such, you will agree with me that this is not confidential enough for the
security and success of this transaction as calls passing through the operator
are monitored. It is imperative therefore that you constantly e-mail or fax me
on daily basis, 

Above all, it is important to let you know that I and my colleagues since we
are three involved, an attorney will be involve for i.e. procurement of all
necessary documents to back your claim as next-of-kin to Gen. Ibrahim Moussa. I
implore you therefore to make out time to follow this business without
distractions since all is not suppose to last more than seven 5-7 working days
if diligently followed by both parties. 

To have a smooth deal, you will be required to open an account with our
corresponding bank in united kingdom, and the bank is also in affiliation with
the Hang seng bank of Hong Kong, I shall forward the details of the bank to you
as soon as you are ready to open that bank account with bank in united kingdom,

Attached is the Claims Form which you need to fill with your hand writing and
fax back to me, for onward submission to the appropriate department (Legal
Dept) here in the bank for processing. This should be done immediately to
enable us begin the filing process. Thereafter, if the application of claims is
verified you will be required by my bank to forward to them some important
documents convincing them that you are the Real Affiliated next-of-kin. These
documents are as follows: (1) Evidence of Tax payment of the deceased company,
(2) Certificate of Incorporation of the deceased company, (3)
Next-of-kin international pass port for identification, (4) A copy of deceased
death certificate.  affidavits of claim, All these requirements shall be
made available which I will fax to you and you will be required to fax it to my
Bank when requested, except number (3) Next-of-kin international pass port
which you have to provide personally. Although I want to let you know we shall
pay two years backdated taxes of late Gen. Ibrahim Moussa's company since his
death, as it is believed that the next-of-kin or whosoever that manages his
company should have paid the taxes.

Following the receipt of the above mentioned documents requested from you by my
bank, it would be forwarded to different departments in my bank concerned in
the approval of funds of this magnitude. Thereafter an approval will be given
if the document found in your application file is certified ok.

Finally your application file will move to the final and the paying office for
the last approval to be issued from the bank.

Remain blessed while I await your response.

Best regards,

Mr. Wang Qin .
messages.raw:
WANG QIN

FROM: THE DESK OF MR.WANG QIN HANG SENG BANK LTD DES VOEUX RD.BRANCH CENTRAL HONG KONG

FAX: 852-301-43948

RE: OUR CONFIDENTIAL BUSINESS MATTER

Dear Skipper,

First and foremost I wish to thank you very much for your quick response to my proposal and your willingness to assist us in this our beneficial transaction. However let me explain to you what this transaction is all about and also to let you know your part in making this transaction a successful one. Just as the proposal briefly explained, the funds we want to transfer into your provided account is a credit balance of one of our numerous customers who died some year ago.

This is the basis on which we started soliciting assistance from you to help us by providing your required Banking co-ordinates into which the funds will be transferred as the next-of-kin to Gen. Ibrahim Moussa. Since all is now ready for this transfer with your declared assistance, we want you to understand that the level of confidentiality required in this deal should not be neglected. As such, we implore you to maintain absolute secrecy throughout the consummation of this transaction since we cannot afford a mistake. We have perfected modalities through which approvals will be secured in a matter of days with your maximum co-operation and also following all the required instructions that may be given to you during the course of this transaction. On the other hand, we will not be having any problems since we are same people that are going to handle everything pertaining to approvals in the Bank here.

The most important thing to note at this juncture is the importance of daily communication with me via fax/e-mail communication. This will help us bridge any gap and be fully acquainted with the day-to-day development in this transaction. I may not be able to call you always since all outgoing international calls from the bank are made through the secretary/operator, as such, you will agree with me that this is not confidential enough for the security and success of this transaction as calls passing through the operator are monitored. It is imperative therefore that you constantly e-mail or fax me on daily basis,

Above all, it is important to let you know that I and my colleagues since we are three involved, an attorney will be involve for i.e. procurement of all necessary documents to back your claim as next-of-kin to Gen. Ibrahim Moussa. I implore you therefore to make out time to follow this business without distractions since all is not suppose to last more than seven 5-7 working days if diligently followed by both parties.

To have a smooth deal, you will be required to open an account with our corresponding bank in united kingdom, and the bank is also in affiliation with the Hang seng bank of Hong Kong, I shall forward the details of the bank to you as soon as you are ready to open that bank account with bank in united kingdom,

Attached is the Claims Form which you need to fill with your hand writing and fax back to me, for onward submission to the appropriate department (Legal Dept) here in the bank for processing. This should be done immediately to enable us begin the filing process. Thereafter, if the application of claims is verified you will be required by my bank to forward to them some important documents convincing them that you are the Real Affiliated next-of-kin. These documents are as follows: (1) Evidence of Tax payment of the deceased company, (2) Certificate of Incorporation of the deceased company, (3) Next-of-kin international pass port for identification, (4) A copy of deceased death certificate. [5] affidavits of claim, All these requirements shall be made available which I will fax to you and you will be required to fax it to my Bank when requested, except number (3) Next-of-kin international pass port which you have to provide personally. Although I want to let you know we shall pay two years backdated taxes of late Gen. Ibrahim Moussa's company since his death, as it is believed that the next-of-kin or whosoever that manages his company should have paid the taxes.

Following the receipt of the above mentioned documents requested from you by my bank, it would be forwarded to different departments in my bank concerned in the approval of funds of this magnitude. Thereafter an approval will be given if the document found in your application file is certified ok.

Finally your application file will move to the final and the paying office for the last approval to be issued from the bank.

Remain blessed while I await your response.

Best regards,

Mr. Wang Qin .

messages.body:
Dear Mr. Qin,

 

OK everything will be as you say as soon as we get back on dry land.  We had a
bit of a mishap last night in a storm.  The weather started getting rough and
our tiny ship was tossed.  If not for the actions of my fearless crew Gilligan,
the Minnow would have been lost.  Our ship set ground on a deserted and
uncharted island.  We are here with Thurston Howell III and his wife, a movie
star, the professor and Mary Ann.  As soon as we are rescued we shall complete
the deal.  As for now give me the detains and I will write to you on my
satellite notebook computer that the professor has hooked up to the generator
and a bicycle that Gilligan rides.  I will be very confidential in this
transaction.

 

Skipper
messages.raw:
SKIPPER

Dear Mr. Qin,

OK everything will be as you say as soon as we get back on dry land. We had a bit of a mishap last night in a storm. The weather started getting rough and our tiny ship was tossed. If not for the actions of my fearless crew Gilligan, the Minnow would have been lost. Our ship set ground on a deserted and uncharted island. We are here with Thurston Howell III and his wife, a movie star, the professor and Mary Ann. As soon as we are rescued we shall complete the deal. As for now give me the detains and I will write to you on my satellite notebook computer that the professor has hooked up to the generator and a bicycle that Gilligan rides. I will be very confidential in this transaction.

Skipper

messages.body:
Dear skipper,

 compliment of the day,

I thank you for your prompt response to my mail, how soon are you coming to dry
land, and i want you to realise the fact that we have some few days to conclude
this transaction,

you will be required to open account with one of our corresponding bank, to
enable us to have a smooth and a perfect transfer,

the attached above is claim form, you will be required to fill and fax back to
me as soon as you received it to enable us to proceed, because as soon as i
recevied the claim form , from you i shall summitte it to the our foreign
deposite department to proceed in processing of your claim as the next of kin
to the deceased, gen. ibrahim moussa, 

please kindly send me your scan copy of international passport.

i await your urgent response to my mail.

Best regards
Mr. wang qin.
He sends this letter:




                                    HANG SENG BANK LIMITED

                                                    HONG KONG.                

 

 

The Executive Director,

Office of the Director, Legal/Documentary Credit Dept.

HANG SENG BANK LTD, Headquarters Annex,

HONG KONG.

 

Dear Sir,

APPLICATION FOR CLAIM AS "NEXT-OF-KIN" DRAWING FROM

ACCOUNT OF LATE GEN. IBRAHIM MOUSSA  AMOUNT:

US$20.5M, BILL NO.HSBL/1/7289/01

 

First of all, I do hereby request to maintain that you know about me, who we
are. I am the next of kin following our close business relationship with late
GEN. IBRAHIM MOUSSA  with whom we have jointly enjoyed a broad business
conglomerate. I trust you will understand that in these circumstances
therefore, I will be pleased to receive as soon as possible this payment in
accordance with the below referred account and bill duly established and we
request you to transfer the above outstanding deposit into account as follows:


 PART ONE

        

       Name of company:............................

                   Name of Beneficiary:...........................

      Address:..................................

       ........................................

      P.O Box. (If Any).............................

      Tel:......................................

      Fax:......................................

 

PART TWO
 

Bank Name:.................................

Bank Address:................................

                   Bank Tel/Fax/Telex:............................

Sorting Code:.................................

Account No.:.................................

                  Amount:...................................

 

I am prepared and ready to submit or surrender any Documentary evidence(s) on
demand and also I would be solely responsible for all obligations thereto.
Kindly note the above account and change all your records according to My favor
and swift-wire transfer the principal amount of the face value (100%). I hope
this application shall be granted. Waiting for your urgent response. Thank you
for your co-operation.

 

Yours faithfully,

 

Name:....................................

 

Next of kin sign:...............................

messages.body:
Dear Mr. Qin,

 

We are on dry land but nobody has found us yet and completed our rescue.  We
have a lovely blue lagoon and have fashioned huts out of native material. 
Ginger, the movie star has been parading around in sequin dresses which I find
hard to believe that she packed all those clothes for a three hour tour.  I am
so sorry that I can not fax back to form as my computer is not a fax machine. 
Until we are rescued I will not have access to a fax.  I can however receive
your e-mails.  My passport is a bit soggy at this point but as soon as it dries
out and I get a scanner I will send you a copy.  Mr. Qin please make sure to
keep this confidential as my little buddy Gilligan sometimes gets into trouble
and reads my mail.

 

Skipper
messages.raw:
SKIPPER

Dear Mr. Qin,

We are on dry land but nobody has found us yet and completed our rescue. We have a lovely blue lagoon and have fashioned huts out of native material. Ginger, the movie star has been parading around in sequin dresses which I find hard to believe that she packed all those clothes for a three hour tour. I am so sorry that I can not fax back to form as my computer is not a fax machine. Until we are rescued I will not have access to a fax. I can however receive your e-mails. My passport is a bit soggy at this point but as soon as it dries out and I get a scanner I will send you a copy. Mr. Qin please make sure to keep this confidential as my little buddy Gilligan sometimes gets into trouble and reads my mail.

Skipper

messages.body:
Mr. Qin,



We are offshore right now and no one has found us yet.  My passport is dry but
I do not have a scanner here.  My colleagues are all doing well.  Gilligan has
been running around causing trouble.  He said that he saw a gorilla in the
jungle but I think that he was drinking too much fermented coconut juice.  Mr.
Howell and his wife are thinking about buying the island we are on if we are
rescued.  He wants to place a country club on the island with the 18th hole of
the golf course next to the lagoon.  Ginger is trying to find a mirror and the
professor is trying to develop a cure for crabs by making a palm leaf extract
potion.  Mary Ann is well Marry Ann.  She is everyone's fantasy of the girl
next door.  We have named the Island after my first mate Gilligan as he is the
first one to set foot on the Island after the storm.  We have a digital camera
so I will send you a picture of the boat.  As you can see will will have a
rough time fixing it.



I will send the documents as soon as I can but you must understand that the
conditions here are as primitive as can be.  See the attached picture.  I am
the one in the hat.

Regards

Skipper
messages.raw:
SKIPPER

Mr. Qin,

We are offshore right now and no one has found us yet. My passport is dry but I do not have a scanner here. My colleagues are all doing well. Gilligan has been running around causing trouble. He said that he saw a gorilla in the jungle but I think that he was drinking too much fermented coconut juice. Mr. Howell and his wife are thinking about buying the island we are on if we are rescued. He wants to place a country club on the island with the 18th hole of the golf course next to the lagoon. Ginger is trying to find a mirror and the professor is trying to develop a cure for crabs by making a palm leaf extract potion. Mary Ann is well Marry Ann. She is everyone's fantasy of the girl next door. We have named the Island after my first mate Gilligan as he is the first one to set foot on the Island after the storm. We have a digital camera so I will send you a picture of the boat. As you can see will will have a rough time fixing it.

I will send the documents as soon as I can but you must understand that the conditions here are as primitive as can be. See the attached picture. I am the one in the hat.

Regards

Skipper

[we didn't get the pics - picture Alan Hale Jr. in a loud shirt]

messages.body:
Dear Skipper,

 compliment of the day, 

Thanks for your response to my mail, i pray for you to get rescue as soon as
possible, 

pls hold on with the sending of the fax, do the opening of the account and get
the account activated, and fill the claim form with the account informatiom.

I am sending you the website of the bank so you can browse it and make
enquiries on offshore/on-line account opening. I advice you like I said earlier
that you open an account via online  With the bank so that once the funds are
released, they will be moved Straight into your account and the transfer will
not attract the Monetary bodies, as the transfer will be seen as in-house.
(Same telex 
type and banking coordinates with my Bank).You can then transfer the  funds in
safe bits to your main account for both of us. 

Please find below the banks website. 


Please do this and get back to me immediately.

 

Sincerely,
Mr. Wang Qin.

Thanks for your response to my mail, i pray for you to get rescue as soon as possible,

pls hold on with the sending of the fax, do the opening of the account and get the account activated, and fill the claim form with the account informatiom.

I am sending you the website of the bank so you can browse it and make enquiries on offshore/on-line account opening. I advice you like I said earlier that you open an account via online With the bank so that once the funds are released, they will be moved Straight into your account and the transfer will not attract the Monetary bodies, as the transfer will be seen as in-house. (Same telex type and banking coordinates with my Bank).You can then transfer the funds in safe bits to your main account for both of us.

Please find below the banks website.

TRANS ATLANTIC PRIVATE BANK UK.

http: www.tapb.com

Please do this and get back to me immediately.

Sincerely, Mr. Wang Qin.

messages.body:
Mr Qin,
 
 

I hope you received the picture of the Minnow and as you can see the storm
really took a big chunk out of our ship.  The professor has tried to cook up
some caulk from some native plant species.  Gilligan actually did see a gorilla
but Ginger swooned it with a lovely little dance and now that are sharing a hut
together.  He is actually quite nice and was just looking for a mate.  We have
not been rescued yet but we are holding on though the conditions are as
primitive as can be.  If you have any contacts in the Coast Guard could you
send them our way.  We saw an airplane but the guy was going the wrong way to
rescue us.  It is very disheartening that we have not been rescued as I want to
help you get the money and get a share.  Even a lot of money does not help
those in need like us, as Mr. Howell can attest.  He has millions and he is
stuck hear with all of us.  As I said earlier we named the island for my little
buddy and first mate Gilligan.  Now it is officially "Gilligan's Island".  I
have to go for now as I have coconuts to cut up for the pie.  Mary Ann send
here best wishes and asks if you are single? 


Skipper
messages.raw:
SKIPPER

We have not been rescued yet but we are holding on though the conditions are as primitive as can be. If you have any contacts in the Coast Guard could you send them our way. Even a lot of money does not help those in need like us, as Mr. Howell can attest. He has millions and he is stuck hear with all of us. As I said earlier we named the island for my little buddy and first mate Gilligan. Now it is officially "Gilligan's Island". I have to go for now as I have coconuts to cut up for the pie. messages.body:
Dear Wang, 


We did send out a distress signal.  I can not call as we have now telephone
service here other than two coconuts strung together.  The professor will apply
for a patent when we get back.  I did e-mail the Coast Guard but they want a
very large bribe from us as there schedule is now very busy chasing terrorist
around the world.  I have sent out messages and we hope to get a reply.  I was
just hoping that maybe you had a contact who could help us.  By the way do you
have a picture of yourself, it would be nice to see your face so I know with
whom I speak.  It is a little lonely here with just the Howells' Gilligan,
Ginger, Marry Ann and the professor here. 

Had go see what Gilligan was up to.  He found a pilot that crashed here 33
years ago.  Wrong Way Feldman crashed his biplane on our island.  His plane has
some damage but Gilligan thinks that we may be able to fix the plane from some
part on the Minnow.  I will let you know.  We may be saved very soon now.  Got
to go help with the plane. 
 

Please write back, 

Skipper

SKIPPER

I was just hoping that maybe you had a contact who could help us. By the way do you have a picture of yourself, it would be nice to see your face so I know with whom I speak. It is a little lonely here with just the Howells' Gilligan, Ginger, Marry Ann and the professor here.

Had go see what Gilligan was up to. He found a pilot that crashed here 33 years ago. Wrong Way Feldman crashed his biplane on our island. His plane has some damage but Gilligan thinks that we may be able to fix the plane from some part on the Minnow. I will let you know. We may be saved very soon now. Got to go help with the plane.

Please write back,

Skipper

messages.body:
Dear Wang, 



Sorry I have been busy preparing for our rescue.  We have been helping the
pilot "Wrong Way" Feldman repair his plane.  We were able to fix the wings and
control levers.  We had enough gas in the minnow to fill the tank.  The Octane
was not high enough so we added Mr. Howell's 40 year old scotch to the mix and
we thing that the engine will fire.  We are clearing the palm trees to make a
runway and soon Feldman will be off and we can be rescued.  His plane is too
small to carry us so we will have to wait.  It should be just a few more days
now. 

Skipper

Skipper replies:

messages.body:
Dear Wang,
 
 

Well we had a huge setback with the Pilot Wrong Way Feldman.  He was able to
get back to Hawaii after we fixed his plane.  He could not take any passengers
as the plane was small.  We heard his interview which was broadcast on radio
but he was unable to give directions as to our whereabouts.  We are all sad and
now our ship the "Minnow" can not be saved as we used the parts to fix the
plane.  We are coping alright and the whole gang on Gilligan's Island are doing
fine.  We eat lots of coconuts, we eat raw coconuts, stewed coconuts, cooked
coconuts, creamed coconuts, shredded coconuts, BBQ coconuts, poached coconuts,
boiled coconuts, coconut milk, steamed coconuts, broiled coconuts, grilled
coconuts, plank roasted coconuts, and shrimp.  Do you like shrimp? 

 

Skipper
messages.raw:
SKIPPER

Dear Wang,

Well we had a huge setback with the Pilot Wrong Way Feldman. He was able to get back to Hawaii after we fixed his plane. He could not take any passengers as the plane was small. We heard his interview which was broadcast on radio but he was unable to give directions as to our whereabouts. We are all sad and now our ship the "Minnow" can not be saved as we used the parts to fix the plane. We are coping alright and the whole gang on Gilligan's Island are doing fine. We eat lots of coconuts, we eat raw coconuts, stewed coconuts, cooked coconuts, creamed coconuts, shredded coconuts, BBQ coconuts, poached coconuts, boiled coconuts, coconut milk, steamed coconuts, broiled coconuts, grilled coconuts, plank roasted coconuts, and shrimp. Do you like shrimp?

Skipper

messages.body:
Dear Wang, 

 

I am so sorry that I have not written but we have been having some real
problems here of late.  Our food supply was running low and we did not have
enough to eat.  We were all losing a lot of weight and were starving to death. 
Rainwater was not enough.  We decided that one of us must sacrifice for the
good of the rest.  Though I was the most meaty I was spared as I needed to
organize the rescue.  We took a secret vote and decided that Ginger was the
most useless to us, so we ate her.  First I ate her and then Gilligan ate her
and then the professor and Mary Ann and the Howells.  She gave us all
sustenance and now we are all agreed that Ginger is good for something.  I hope
that we are rescued soon but I have to admit that I would eat Ginger again and
again.
 
I hope that I am not too late to conduct business with you.  I could use the
money once we leave Gilligan's Island.  Please tell me of your life to help
cheer us up.  Mary Ann saw your picture and asked if you were married or had a
girlfriend.  She said that she would consider becoming a mistress if the
benefits were good.  Take care my friend. 

 

Skipper
messages.raw:
SKIPPER

Dear Wang,

I am so sorry that I have not written but we have been having some real problems here of late. Our food supply was running low and we did not have enough to eat. We were all losing a lot of weight and were starving to death. Rainwater was not enough. We decided that one of us must sacrifice for the good of the rest. Though I was the most meaty I was spared as I needed to organize the rescue. We took a secret vote and decided that Ginger was the most useless to us, so we ate her. First I ate her and then Gilligan ate her and then the professor and Mary Ann and the Howells. She gave us all sustenance and now we are all agreed that Ginger is good for something. I hope that we are rescued soon but I have to admit that I would eat Ginger again and again.

I hope that I am not too late to conduct business with you. I could use the money once we leave Gilligan's Island. Please tell me of your life to help cheer us up. Mary Ann saw your picture and asked if you were married or had a girlfriend. She said that she would consider becoming a mistress if the benefits were good. Take care my friend.

Skipper

messages.body:
Wang,

  

I am so happy to hear from you.  We arrived back in Hawaii and Gilligan was so
glad to be back that he actually peed his pants.  We all mourn the loss of
Ginger.  It was a bit difficult explaining to Hawaii 5-0 that we had to kill
and eat her.  Mary Ann and I are living together in a small hut on the North
Shore.  She surfs the big ones daily and I am looking for a new boat to
skipper.  Due to our newfound celebrity Martha Stewart came over and did the
decorating for the hut.  She seems to like the orange color a lot right now. 
It also seems a bit austere.  I hope it is only a phase.  I was going to get on
as the captain of a Japanese fishing boat but before they returned the U.S.
Navy hit and sunk them with a submarine.  It is a good thing that our insurance
claim on the minnow came through and we now have a couple of million dollars to
live on.  But don't worry we could all use a little more so lets do the deal.

  

The professor is now working for Betty Crocker at a laboratory.  Oh the things
he can do with a coconut.  Mr. and Mrs Howell have purchased a country club and
golf course.  They closed it down and have built a mansion on the 18th hole. 
They play polo on the weekends and Mary Ann and I went to see them last month.
My little buddy Gilligan is doing well and bought out Dukes downtown.  He is
turning it into a beatnik poetry bar.  If you come to Hawaii let us know, we
can put you up for free.

  

Lets do this deal and get it done now.
 

Skipper
messages.raw:
SKIPPER

Wang,

I am so happy to hear from you. We arrived back in Hawaii and Gilligan was so glad to be back that he actually peed his pants. We all mourn the loss of Ginger. It was a bit difficult explaining to Hawaii 5-0 that we had to kill and eat her. Mary Ann and I are living together in a small hut on the North Shore. She surfs the big ones daily and I am looking for a new boat to skipper. Due to our newfound celebrity Martha Stewart came over and did the decorating for the hut. She seems to like the orange color a lot right now. It also seems a bit austere. I hope it is only a phase. I was going to get on as the captain of a Japanese fishing boat but before they returned the U.S. Navy hit and sunk them with a submarine. It is a good thing that our insurance claim on the minnow came through and we now have a couple of million dollars to live on. But don't worry we could all use a little more so lets do the deal.

The professor is now working for Betty Crocker at a laboratory. Oh the things he can do with a coconut. Mr. and Mrs Howell have purchased a country club and golf course. They closed it down and have built a mansion on the 18th hole. They play polo on the weekends and Mary Ann and I went to see them last month. My little buddy Gilligan is doing well and bought out Dukes downtown. He is turning it into a beatnik poetry bar. If you come to Hawaii let us know, we can put you up for free.

Lets do this deal and get it done now.

Skipper

Sadly Mr. Qin has not responded. The whole gang of Gilligan's Island is most disappointed. They were going to name their new boat the 419 in honor of Mr. Qin. Feel free to write Mr. Qin if you wish. I am sure that he is having a wonderful time.

Wang Qin <wangqinhk@cosmo.com>
